Common Artifacts.Name: Vicious Hatchet

Common Artifacts.Name: Tavern Sign
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 1 block for every monster in your slice with an attack intent at the beginning of your turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Trowel
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 2 block when you exhaust a card.

Common Artifacts.Name: Toy Compass
Common Artifacts.Effect: Get 1 mana each time you play 5 Skill (blue) cards in a single turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Torn Button
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain +8 max HP.

Common Artifacts.Name: Tiny Bamboo
Common Artifacts.Effect: On future Card Reward screens you have 1 additional card to choose from.

Common Artifacts.Name: Tilted Cairn
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 5 block at the end of your turn if you haven't used any Attack (red) cards this turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Thumb Lancet
Common Artifacts.Effect: If you don't have enough gemstones to take the selected action, you can do it by losing 5 HP for each missing gemstone (as long as it won't kill you).

Common Artifacts.Name: Silver Mirror
Common Artifacts.Effect: Every time someone gives you block, they get half that.

Common Artifacts.Name: Silver Spoon
Common Artifacts.Effect: Get 3 gemstones.

Common Artifacts.Name: Nekomata
Common Artifacts.Effect: Every 10th attack is played twice.

Common Artifacts.Name: Sharp Throne
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 5 block after using 3 swords in one turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Ripe Tomato
Common Artifacts.Effect: Start each battle with 10 block.

Common Artifacts.Name: Paperclip
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 1 mana when your deck is shuffled for the first time during each battle.

Common Artifacts.Name: Quartz Lens
Common Artifacts.Effect: Your attacks deal +1 damage in the Near Range and -1 damage in the far range (but no less than 1).

Common Artifacts.Name: Porcelain Skull
Common Artifacts.Effect: Gain 5 block after using 5 Arrows in one turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Loot Crate
Common Artifacts.Effect: Draw 1 additional card and get 1 mana after you kill your first monster in each battle.

Common Artifacts.Name: Kielbasa
Common Artifacts.Effect: One random card from your starting hand has cost reduced to 0.

Common Artifacts.Name: Homicidal Organ
Common Artifacts.Effect: Your attacks deal +1 damage if you have no Skill (blue) cards in your hand.

Common Artifacts.Name: Flambeau
Common Artifacts.Effect: Every 3rd exhausted card heals you 1 HP.

Common Artifacts.Name: Evergreen Leaf
Common Artifacts.Effect: Get healed 1 HP every time another hero is healed during the battle.

Common Artifacts.Name: Crane
Common Artifacts.Effect: Give 3 Block to all heroes if you haven't used any Attack cards this turn.

Common Artifacts.Name: Bottle of Miasma
Common Artifacts.Effect: Deals 20 damage randomly distributed among monsters at the beginning of the battle.

Common Artifacts.Name: Bloody Grail

Common Artifacts.Name: Bandaid
Common Artifacts.Effect: Heal 3 HP after each battle you survive.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Best Pal
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Deal +2 damage when you have no incoming damage.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Clam
Rare Artifacts.Effect: You get 1 gemstone after picking a Card Reward. You can no longer skip Card Rewards.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Dice
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Number of mana points is randomized each turn (between 1 and 8).

Rare Artifacts.Name: Duck Collar
Rare Artifacts.Effect: At the start of your turn add 1 mark to the marked monster.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Explosive Eyeball
Rare Artifacts.Effect: When you die, deal 20 damage to all monsters in hear range and 10 in far range.

Rare Artifacts.Name: First Blood
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Heal yourself for 5HP after killing your first monster in battle.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Friendly Toad
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Reduces the card reward options after completed floors by one, but also heals the holder by 10 HP if they do not take a new card.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Glass Caltrops
Rare Artifacts.Effect: After monster's turn, distribute all of your block as damage to random monsters.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Golden Ticket
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Your prices in future locations YOU ADD are lowered to 1 gemstone

Rare Artifacts.Name: Iron Snowflake
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Start your next turn with block equal to double the amount of damage you take this turn.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Jar of Pickles
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Get 1 mana point when you deal at least 15 damage total. Once per turn.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Lump of Coal
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Increase rarity of one of the cards when picking a Card Reward

Rare Artifacts.Name: Memento
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Draw an additional card (+1) at the beginning of your turn

Rare Artifacts.Name: Moka Pot
Rare Artifacts.Effect: You can use 2 options in each future location

Rare Artifacts.Name: Red Cap
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Heal 15 HP at the beginning of a boss battle

Rare Artifacts.Name: Spring
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Gain 1 additional mana if the sum of incoming damage at the beginning of your turn is higher than 15.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Star
Rare Artifacts.Effect: You get 1 additional mana when fighting bosses.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Tiny Anchor
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Heals the holder to 66% of their max HP if they survive a battle where they ended with 33% or less of max HP.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Tsantsa
Rare Artifacts.Effect: If the holder takes more than 5 damage from a single attack, the Tsantsa reflects half of it back to the attacker.

Rare Artifacts.Name: Wooden Bowl
Rare Artifacts.Effect: Reduces the holder's Gems to 1 at the beginning of each battle and heals the holder by 10 HP for each Gem that was removed.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Burrito

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Can of Beans

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Flawed Ruby
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Get 3 additional mana on the first turn and get 1 mana less on later turns

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Goldfish
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: If another hero starts a turn with 10 HP or less, transfer half of your HP to them; then heal up to 10 HP.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Iron Pan
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Completely immune to non-magic ranged attacks.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Miniature Chair
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Keep unspent mana points between turns.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Pawn
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Don't discard the cards in your hand at the end of your turn.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Rage Cage
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: All attack deal +2 damage. You can no longer block yourself.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Three Seashells
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Each time you are damaged in combat, other players are healed for the same amount.

Legendary Artifacts.Name: Whale Figurine
Legendary Artifacts.Effect: Gain 1 extra Gem after each completed battle.
